alert.note: Alert for Tippecanoe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:41PM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TIPPECANOE...CLINTON...SOUTHWESTERN HOWARD... NORTHERN BOONE...NORTHERN HAMILTON...TIPTON AND NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 1041 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Crawfordsville, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Thorntown around 1045 PM EDT. Lebanon and Ulen around 1050 PM EDT. Kirklin around 1055 PM EDT. Sheridan around 1100 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kempton, Tipton, Cicero, Arcadia and Atlanta. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 142 and 162. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central and west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
